plot: From marriage to a family of his own, a father tries to photograph the moments that make up his life. After his camera fails he turns to his mind's eye as he attempts to bring clarity to his most important memories.
title: An Album
plot_es: From marriage to a family of his own, a father tries to photograph the moments that make up his life. After his camera fails he turns to his mind's eye as he attempts to bring clarity to his most important memories.
plot_en: From marriage to a family of his own, a father tries to photograph the moments that make up his life. After his camera fails he turns to his mind's eye as he attempts to bring clarity to his most important memories.
